course_name: Foundation Skills for Mental Health Practice
description: This course provides a clinical skill foundation for effective mental health practice. The course focuses on the clinical skills that underpin contemporary best practice in mental health. The course content is set and there are no elective learning activities or assessment items. Course content includes: assessment skills (observation, interviewing, use of standardised procedures and measures, risk assessment), diagnosis and formulation, counselling microskills, working alliance formation, collaborative treatment planning, and report writing.
